info.title: Monkeytype API
info.description:
Documentation for the endpoints provided by the Monkeytype API server.

Note that authentication is performed with the Authorization HTTP header in the format `Authorization: ApeKey YOUR_APE_KEY`

There is a rate limit of `30 requests per minute` across all endpoints with some endpoints being more strict. Rate limit rates are shared across all ape keys.

tags.name: public
tags.description: Public endpoints such as typing stats.

tags.name: leaderboards
tags.description: All-time and daily leaderboards of the fastest typers.

tags.name: quotes
tags.description: Quote ratings and new quote submissions

get.description:
Get list of public service announcements.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 60 times per minute for regular users.

x-ratelimit-limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

x-ratelimit-remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

x-ratelimit-reset.description: The timestamp of the start of the next period

401.description: Authentication required but not provided or invalid

schema.description: Authentication required but not provided or invalid

503.description: Endpoint disabled or server is under maintenance

schema.description: Endpoint disabled or server is under maintenance

get.description:
Get all-time leaderboard.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 500 times per hour for regular users.

parameters.name: friendsOnly
parameters.description: include only users from your friends list, defaults to false.

get.description:
Get daily leaderboard.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 500 times per hour for regular users.

**Required configuration:** This operation can only be called if the [configuration](#tag/configuration/operation/configuration.get) for  `dailyLeaderboards.enabled` is `true`.

parameters.name: friendsOnly
parameters.description: include only users from your friends list, defaults to false.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 500 times per hour for regular users.

get.description:
Gets up to 1000 results.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 60 times per hour for regular users and up to 30 times per day with ApeKeys.

parameters.name: onOrAfterTimestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the earliest result to fetch. If omitted the most recent results are fetched.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the item at which to begin the response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to the given amount.

x-ratelimit-limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

x-ratelimit-reset.description: The timestamp of the start of the next period

get.description:
Gets a user's profile.

**Rate limit:** This operation can be called up to 100 times per hour for regular users.

**Required configuration:** This operation can only be called if the [configuration](#tag/configuration/operation/configuration.get) for  `users.profiles.enabled` is `true`.

testsByDays.description: Number of tests by day. Last element of the array is on the date `lastDay`. `null` means no tests on that day.

lastDay.description: Timestamp of the last day included in the test activity
